title: Web-Based OS Portfolio
description: A macOS-inspired web-based operating system built with React, featuring draggable windows, a dock, and terminal-style navigation.

title: Realtime Chat Application
description: A realtime chat application with authentication, private rooms, and message persistence using WebSockets.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with product management, cart system, and secure payments.

title: Terminal Portfolio
description: A developer portfolio controlled entirely through terminal commands with autocomplete and history support.

title: AI Resume Analyzer
description: An AI-powered resume analyzer that scores resumes against job descriptions and provides improvement suggestions.
